summary: Footer text was updated to an i18n-driven single-line copyright string, and the category grid was updated to show per-category images via a new getCategoryImagePath mapping. However, the required static image assets themselves were not added in the diff, and the category grid now uses hardcoded English category names from utils (potentially changing localization behavior beyond the request).

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate and add cartoon-style occupation images for each existing service category and store them as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated with the specified filenames.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no new files added under frontend/public/assets/generated (or anywhere). getCategoryImagePath references these files, but the assets themselves are not present in the provided diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Category grid now derives category display names from a hardcoded CATEGORY_NAMES map (English strings) instead of i18n translations, which may remove/alter localized category naming behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-3 only asked to display per-category images and keep layout responsive; it did not ask to change how category names are sourced/displayed. Using CATEGORY_NAMES may override prior localized names.
